Field.Description: OAMP teransmit enable
Field.Name: TRANSMIT_ENABLE

Field.Description: OAMP scan machine enable
Field.Name: SCANNER_ENABLE

Field.Description: Send all packets to CPU(debug purpose)
Field.Name: RX_2_CPU

Field.Description: '0' - Jericho/'1' - Jericho2
Field.Name: EVENT_FORMAT

Field.Description: Minimum OAMP packet size
Field.Name: MIN_PKT_SIZE

Field.Description: Number of system clocks in one second
Field.Name: NUM_CLOCKS_SEC

Field.Description: Value to put in PTCH2 SSP field for Down-MEP packets(OAMP port)
Field.Name: PTCH_PP_SSP

Field.Description: Value to put in PTCH2 Opaque field(PTCH-opaque-pt-attr) for Down-MEP packets
Field.Name: PRT_QUALIFIER

Field.Description: Enable/Disable sending an event to CPU when LOC is set for a RMEP
Field.Name: LOC_SET_EVENT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable/Disable sending an event to CPU when almost LOC is set for a RMEP
Field.Name: ALMOST_LOC_SET_EVENT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable/Disable sending an event to CPU when LOC is cleared for a RMEP
Field.Name: LOC_CLEAR_EVENT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable/Disable sending an event to CPU when RDI is set for a RMEP
Field.Name: RDI_SET_EVENT_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable/Disable sending an event to CPU when RDI is cleared for a RMEP
Field.Name: RDI_CLEAR_EVENT_ENABLE

Field.Description: TX Counter Prefix
Field.Name: TX_COUNTER_CFG_PREFIX

Field.Description: TX Counter Shift
Field.Name: TX_COUNTER_CFG_SHIFT

Field.Description: RX Counter Prefix
Field.Name: RX_COUNTER_CFG_PREFIX

Field.Description: RX Counter Shift
Field.Name: RX_COUNTER_CFG_SHIFT

Field.Description: Enable/Disable SLR measurement in the Txm
Field.Name: MEASURE_NEXT_RECEIVED_SLR_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: OAMP_INIT_MEP_DB_BANK_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: MEP DB scan rate configuration per bank(12)

Field.Description: '0' - normal scan rate(1.67ms), '1' -slow scan rate(3.33ms)
Field.Name: SCAN_RATE_BANK

Field.Description: Number of txm idle stages before active
Field.Name: NUM_IDLE_STAGES

Field.Description: Number of txm active stages before idle
Field.Name: NUM_ACTIVE_STAGES

Field.Description: Number of system clocks in one MEP-DB scan(1.67ms for long and 3.33ms for short entries)
Field.Name: NUM_CLOCKS_SCAN

Field.Description: Version field to stamp in the OAM header
Field.Name: VERSION

Field.Description: Flags field to stamp in the OAM header
Field.Name: FLAGS

Field.Description: Size of PDU to generate(including the TLV)
Field.Name: TLV_SIZE

Field.Description: TLV offset field to stamp in the OAM header
Field.Name: TLV_OFFSET

Field.Description: TYpe of payload for TLV: 8/16/32 bit pattern
Field.Name: TLV_PATTERN_TYPE

Field.Description: Repitable pattern to put into the TLV
Field.Name: TLV_PATTERN

Field.Description: Value to put in ITMH Forward Destination Info field
Field.Name: OAMP_DESTINATION

Field.Description: Value to put in PPH.FHEI CPU trap code field
Field.Name: OAMP_TRAP_CODE

Field.Description: Value to put in ITMH Forward Traffic Class field for packets trapped to CPU
Field.Name: CPU_PORT_TC

Field.Description: Value to put in ITMH Drop Precedence field for packets trapped to CPU
Field.Name: CPU_PORT_DP

Field.Description: Value to put in PTCH2 SSP field for packets trapped to CPU
Field.Name: PTCH_PP_SSP

Field.Description: Value to put in PTCH2 Opaque field(PTCH-opaque-pt-attr) for packets trapped to CPU
Field.Name: PRT_QUALIFIER

Field.Description: Size of FHEI header in punt packets
Field.Name: PUNT_PPH_FHEI_SIZE

Field.Description: Lookup Enable in RMEP according opcode and Mep Type
Field.Name: LOOKUP_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: OAMP_INIT_MAP_OAM_ID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable OAM-ID lookup according to Trap-ID

Field.Description: Lookup enable
Field.Name: LOOKUP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Outgoing OAMP packets count
Field.Name: TX_COUNTER

Field.Description: Incoming OAMP packets count
Field.Name: RX_COUNTER

Field.Description: Indicates whether the OAMP discarded an interrupt because interrupt fifo was full
Field.Name: ITR_DROP

Field.Description: Sticky bit. Indicates whether oversized packet (>255 B) arrived through the RXC interface
Field.Name: OVERSIZED_RX_PACKET

Field.Description: Number of messages, resides in the events fifo, that wait for CPU to read
Field.Name: ITR_COUNT

Field.Description: Free running count of the number of TXM packets that were dropped due to congestion
Field.Name: TXM_DROPPED_COUNT

Field.Description: Free running count of the number of TXO packets that were dropped due to congestion
Field.Name: TXO_DROPPED_COUNT

AppDB.Name: OAMP_SLM_MEASUREMENT_PERIOD_TIMER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable opcode counting per opcode index

Field.Description: Store the measurement timer initial value.
Field.Name: TXM_SLM_MEASUREMENT_PERIOD_TIMER_INIT_VALUE__N

AppDB.Name: OAMP_OPCODE_FOR_COUNT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable opcode counting per opcode index

Field.Description: Opcode for count
Field.Name: OPCODE_FOR_COUNT

Field.Description: FALSE: Disable opcode countig; TRUE: Enable opcode counting
Field.Name: OPCODE_FOR_COUNT_RX_ENABLE

Field.Description: FALSE: Disable opcode countig; TRUE: Enable opcode counting
Field.Name: OPCODE_FOR_COUNT_TX_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: OAMP_OPCODE_RESPONSE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: OAMP repsonse TCAM table with data offset

Field.Description: OAM opcode or channel type selected based on IS_Y1731
Field.Name: OAM_OPCODE_CHANNEL

Field.Description: Is Y1731 type
Field.Name: IS_Y1731

Field.Description: Response OAM Opcode or channel type
Field.Name: OAM_RSP_OPCODE_CHANNEL

Field.Description: Two lower bits of required OAM sub-type
Field.Name: OAM_TS_FORMAT

Field.Description: Confirmation to generate response packet
Field.Name: GENERATE_RSP

Field.Description: Not used
Field.Name: RESERVED

AppDB.Name: OAMP_RMEP_PUNT_GOOD_TIMER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Sampling of OAM/BFD good packets inital timer values

Field.Description: Profile index for timer initial value.
Field.Name: PUNT_GOOD_PROFILE

Field.Description: Number of HW scans before a single OAM/BFD packet is punted to CPU.
Field.Name: RMEP_PUNT_GOOD_TIMER_INIT_VALUE

AppDB.Name: OAMP_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_MEMORY_ACCESS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: enable dynamic memory access to OAMP
